text: Bambú may refer to: * Bambú (Madrid Metro), a station on Line 1 * Bamboo (film) (original title: Bambú), a 1945 Spanish historical comedy film * "Bambú", a song by Miguel Bosé from Los chicos no lloran, 1990 * "Bambú, Bambú", a 1939 song recorded by Carmen Miranda for the film Down Argentine Way == See also == * Bamboo (disambiguation) * Bambu (disambiguation)
title: Bambú
